channel.title: [508] Rule 12's Private Server (FULL Bounty Hunter || FULL Fight Pits || PvP)
channel.description:
[b]Teh One fucked me over, after stealing my server for his own use, he then black mails me for $10, if you hate TehOne(Ajay), he hosts the other google, please vote. Unforutantely, I don't got the MSN logs because I was using Meebo for MSN on my IPod. Oh well, I have to release before he takes credit.[/b]
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/34j95ko.gif[/img][
Hello and Welcome to Rule 12's Private Server!
[size=5]\|/...INFORMATION...\|/[/size]
Client: You can use any Z508 IP changer, or use ours. Mirror 1 [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nmjmudv2n4m]CLIENT LINK[/url] Cache: Mirror 1 [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?myzjvmzo1yz]CACHE LINK[/url]
Once you downlad the Cache(2nd download link), extract the files to your C:/ drive. Just click the drop down arrow and click C:/. Once you extract it, go to the first download and click "Launch Jar". Type in one of the following IP addresses and you should be good to go.
Features:
[ul][li]FULL BOUNTY HUNTER:[/li] [li]Working Warning Screen upon entry[/li] [li]Non-Wildy outside of Bounty Hunter[/li] [li]Fully working targets, finds a player closest to your level as a target because we only have high crater[/li] [li]Fully Working penalties, Can't leave and Pickup penalities are 100%! Unable to log out, tele, commands, or teletabs while having a penalty[/li] [li]Fully working Bounty Hunter Skulls, Skulls are based on what the Player is carrying/wearing. Coins do not count as wealth[/li] [li]Fully working Bounty Locate, Requirement lvl, rune deletion, and teles to your target[/li] [li]Player drops all items in Bounty Hunter[/li] [li]The best PvP system[/li] [li]Fully working Trading(all does not work though but use 'x' for now)[/li] [li]Fully working bank noting[/li] [li]Full teleblock system[/li] [li]Fully working wilderness levels[/li] [li]Fully working 1v1[/li] [li]Fully working Multi areas[/li] [li]Multi-Barrage[/li] [li]Mage Bonus applys[/li] [li]PK points requirements for untradeables(Fire Capes, Gloves, Void, Torso, Defenders, Etc.)[/li] [li]::item (id) (amount) for items, items cost money[/li] [li]::sellitem (id) (amount) for items[/li] [li]Untradeable items[/li] [li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]All Barrows Effects(except for Karils and Ahrims)[/li] [li]All Void effects[/li] [li]Vesta Special and Degrades[/li] [li]Vesta, Dragon Plate, Dragon Full Helm, Dragon Claws, All Spirit Shields! [/li][/ul]
Getting Started: You will start off in Edgeville(non-wildy). You are started off with 6M Spending XP. To use some of the XP, just do ::level lvlid XP. Level ID's are: 0 - Attack 1 - Defence 3 - HitPoints 4 - Range 5 - Prayer 6 - Magic Once you are done with that, do ::starter and you will recieve a book along with 999k. Use it wisely and read the book for some tips. Teleport to ::pvp to fight players, PvP atm is the only way for training.
Pictures:
[img]http://tinyurl.com/yjqrm9x[/img]
Bounty Hunter Warning [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/bhwarning.jpg[/img]
Targets [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/target.jpg[/img]
Can't Pickup Penalty [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/cantpickup.jpg[/img]
Can't Leave Penalty [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/cantleavepen.jpg[/img]
Bounty Locate [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/bountylocate.jpg[/img]
Bank Tabs [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/banktabs.jpg[/img]
Clan Chat [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/zvdf7d.png[/img]
Dragon Claws [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/dclaws-2.jpg[/img]
PvP Drops [img]http://i258.photobucket.com/albums/hh276/Mod_Cubsmiles/pvpdrops.jpg[/img]
Trading [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/2812/tradingj.jpg[/img]
[/center]
Download Link [url=http://uppit.com/v/S6WRFF6N]DOWNLOAD LINK[/url]

item.title: [508] Rule 12's Private Server (FULL Bounty Hunter || FULL Fight Pits || PvP)
item.dc:creator: @zack_flowers zack_flowers
item.description:
@zack_flowers wrote:

[quote=“zack_flowers, post:82, topic:307421”][quote author=Windfury7 link=topic=403571.msg3016746#msg3016746 date=1257255519]
OMFG… ill open up the dat files and then ill put a 2 by my name and save when i log in nothing happens just regular old boring as non admin… Help?

[/quote]
Buddy, right click your file, and open with wordpad, not notepad, because when you use notepad, it’ll restart your character.[/quote]

Read full topic
